text.__SUMMARY__: The white-bellied lesser house bat (Scotoecus albigula) is a species of vesper bat. It can be found in  Angola, Kenya, Malawi, Mozambique, Somalia, Uganda, and Zambia.
text.References: Skinner, John D.; Chimimba, Christian T. (2005). The Mammals of the Southern African Subregion. Cambridge University Press. p. 324. ISBN 0-521-84418-5.
